entry.string: cat <<EOT > /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/vm_detailspecific/roles/vm_detail/files/server_ip.txt $VCenter_Hostname EOT cat <<EOT > /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/vm_detailspecific/roles/vm_detail/files/hosts.txt $VCentre_Username $VCentre_Password EOT cat <<EOT > /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/vm_detailspecific/roles/vm_detail/files/vm_name.txt $VM_Name EOT vm_value="$(cat /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/vm_detailspecific/roles/vm_detail/files/vm_name.txt | tr -s ' ' | cut -d ' ' -f 2 | tr ' ' ',' | sed 's/,$//')" echo "$vm_value" > vm_specific.txt
